channel.title: Commands :: IT From Scratch
channel.description: echo Input echo "Hello" Show User and Group Information | whoami and id Input whoami Output yourusername Input id Output uid=5000(labex) gid=5000(labex) groups=5000(labex),27(sudo),121(ssl-cert),5002(public) uid: Your User ID (a unique numerical identifier). gid: Your primary Group ID. groups: All the groups you are a member of. Input
